spec_data.Name: python-fmn-rules
spec_data.Description:
fmn is a family of systems to manage end-user notifications triggered by
fedmsg, the Fedora FEDerated MESsage bus.

This module contains the set of "rules" fmn uses to process messages.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Sat 29 Jul 2017 01:02:54 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Message processing rules for Fedora Notifications
